sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {useState} from 'react' import Footer from '../../uiElements/Footer' import Header from '../../uiElements/Header' import LendDetailsTabs from '../../uiElements/Tabs/LendDetailsTabs' import PoolHistoryItem from '../../uiElements/PoolHistoryItem' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import './style.css' import LendPoolDetailsModal from '../../uiElements/LendPoolDetailsModal' import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import {lendMoreDetailPools} from './../../../query/pool/lendPoolDetail' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { lend } from '../../../contractTranscations/lend' export default function LendPoolDetailsCollecting() { const history = useHistory(); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false) const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const location = useLocation(); const poolData = location.state.detail const openModal = () => { setShowModal(prev => !prev) } const [showUserLended, setshowUserLended] = useState(false) const [lendPoolDetails,setLendPoolDetails] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ lendMoreDetailPools(poolData.address, setLendPoolDetails); }, []) const lendMoreFunc = () => { setShowModal(prev => !prev) setshowUserLended(prev => !prev) } return (
history.push('/dashboard')} className="lendDetailsBackLine button">
Back

{lendPoolDetails.username}
Collecting
Open Borrow
{"Pool created on "+ lendPoolDetails.publishedDate}

{lendPoolDetails.borrowRate}

{lendPoolDetails.collateralRatio}
Loan Period
{lendPoolDetails.LoanPeriod}
Repayment Frequency
{lendPoolDetails.RepaymentFrequency}
Collection progress
{lendPoolDetails.collectionProgress}
Collection ends
{lendPoolDetails.collectionEnds}
{showUserLended &&
You lent
700 DAI at 10%
Repayment
128.5 DAI every 2 weeks
First Repayment
5 March 2021
}
Lend more
Pool history
) }
